H0.text: To find food for their young is why some animals hibernate in the winter.

H1.text: To adapt to environmental changes, some animals hibernate in the winter.

H2.text: To attract a mate is the reason some animals hibernate in the winter.

H3.text: To avoid predators is why some animals hibernate in winter.

A4.text: Hibernation functions to conserve energy when sufficient food is not available.
